DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare telephone-administered physical activity counsel program deliver person telephone-linked computer system test relative benefit improve regular physical activity among adult age 55 old .
DOC.brief_title: The CHAT ( Community Health Advice Telephone ) Study
DOC.detailed_description: Two hundred twenty five healthy , sedentary men woman age 55 old randomly assign one three condition : 12 month physical activity counseling deliver human counselor , 12 month physical activity counseling deliver telephone-linked computer system , 12-month attention-control condition ( health education class ) . Data physical activity participation relate quality life indicator ( e.g. , improved physical functioning , fitness , sleep ) collect baseline , 6 month , 12 month post-test 18 month follow-up . The primary hypothesis : - participant either physical activity counsel condition show great improvement physical activity participation 12 month compare attention-control condition ; - participant human counselor condition show great improvement physical activity 12 month relative computer condition ; - participant computer condition show good maintenance physical activity 12 18 month compare participant human counselor condition .
